column4: anyone know how to force X to start in a specific resolution and no other?
I have been, but it refuses to start in the only resolution I gave it in screens.
It drops to a slightly lower resolution instead
you might need to add HorizSync and VertRefresh for your monitor then
It's a laptop screen.  I can't even begin to guess what numbers to use.
you can get the numbers from the INF file used by Windows as well
know where it would be stored in 98?  Windows has been formatted off, but everything was backed up.
can you get the monitor driver from the manufactuers website?
Actually, I tracked down the inf file and looked at it.  It doesn't contain any information of that sort.
I'm not sure I need the exact accurate horiz and vert.  Do you know just typical values for a 1024x768 monitor?
i dont' i always use the exact numbers for my displays
ok.  I'll go try to find the real ones.
can you pastebin the file at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ ?
The inf file?  I can read it, it doesn't contain any useful information.
are you by chance using nvidia drivers?
Hah!  I wish.  This POS has a virge.
